author: Mark Perry
title: The Boomers Will Sacrifice Themselves on the Beaches of COVID-19
description: We will have done our duty by taking the hit in much greater numbers, at last flattening the curve. The post The Boomers Will Sacrifice Themselves on the Beaches of COVID-19 appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: We will have done our duty by taking the hit in much greater numbers, at last flattening the curve. There is nothing so irksome as a military metaphorfocused people taking no prisoners, angry people going nuclear. Yet when it comes to describing our fight aga… [+7239 chars]
